text: I graduated after 6 years of studying. I immediately found a job as a front-end developer.
Working with multiple clients to create the best website presentation and best design.
Developed an AI-powered web application for data management and decision support in investment control.
I worked as a front-end developer, making significant contributions to numerous projects in medialem.
As a full-stack developer, I contributed to the development of an AI-powered legal search web chat application.
